metadata.title: CVE-2024-35861 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb:client: fix potential UAF in cifs_signal_cifsd_for_reconnect() Skipsessions that are being teared down (status == SES_EXITING) to avoid UAF.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
